text.title: States pledge $10 billion for aid to Syria
text.head: States pledge $10 billion for aid to Syria
Sources

list.item: "$10bn raised in humanitarian aid for Syria at London conference – Cameron" — RT , February 4, 2016
"Syria conflict: Donor nations pledge $10bn in vital aid" — BBC News , February 4, 2016
Tim Hume. "Donors pledge $10 billion-plus for Syria as Russian planes pound Aleppo" — CNN , February 4, 2016
